statements: SELECT * FROM scientific_publications;
SELECT title, author, publish_date FROM scientific_publications WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM scientific_publications ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(publication_id) AS publication_count FROM scientific_publications GROUP BY author;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM scientific_publications;
SELECT * FROM scientific_publications ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT title, author FROM scientific_publications WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT publication_id, title, abstract FROM scientific_publications WHERE author LIKE '%John%' AND publish_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as total_publications FROM scientific_publications GROUP BY author HAVING total_publications > 1 ORDER BY total_publications DESC;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(abstract)) as avg_abstract_length, MAX(LENGTH(abstract)) as max_abstract_length FROM scientific_publications;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, authors FROM publications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE title LIKE '%research%';
SELECT id, abstract FROM publications WHERE abstract IS NOT NULL;
SELECT title, authors FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE authors @> ARRAY['John Doe'];
SELECT title, abstract FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, publication_date FROM publications WHERE title ILIKE '%research%' AND abstract ILIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT p.title AS publication_title, r.publication_id, r.reference_id FROM publications p JOIN references r ON p.id = r.publication_id ORDER BY r.reference_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM publications WHERE authors @> ARRAY['John Doe'];

SELECT title, keyword FROM publications JOIN publication_keywords ON publications.publication_id = publication_keywords.publication_id JOIN keywords ON publication_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id;
SELECT publication_id, title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM publications WHERE publication_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM publications WHERE publication_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT title, authors FROM publications WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT p.title, k.keyword FROM publications p INNER JOIN publication_keywords pk ON p.publication_id = pk.publication_id INNER JOIN keywords k ON pk.keyword_id = k.keyword_id WHERE p.publication_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM Publications;
SELECT title, author FROM Publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Authors WHERE affiliation IS NULL;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM Publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT p.title, a.name FROM Publications p JOIN PublicationAuthors pa ON p.id = pa.publication_id JOIN Authors a ON a.id = pa.author_id;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM Publications;
SELECT * FROM Authors WHERE affiliation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as num_publications FROM Publications GROUP BY author ORDER BY num_publications DESC;
SELECT title, author, keyword FROM Publications JOIN PublicationAuthors ON Publications.id = PublicationAuthors.publication_id JOIN Keywords ON PublicationAuthors.author_id = Keywords.id;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM Publications;
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_affiliation = 'University';
SELECT journal_name, journal_editor FROM journals WHERE journal_publisher = 'ABC Publishing';
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM publications;
SELECT publication_title, publication_author FROM publications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;

SELECT publication_title, author_name, keyword_name FROM publications JOIN publication_keywords ON publications.publication_id = publication_keywords.publication_id JOIN keywords ON publication_keywords.keyword_id = keywords.keyword_id WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';

SELECT journal_name, COUNT(publication_id) AS publication_count FROM journals JOIN publications ON journals.journal_id = publications.publication_id GROUP BY journal_name ORDER BY publication_count DESC;
